txt.en: Agelman can be found at your side or can be rallied by sounding your horn.\n\nYou have readied the horse, and should now speak to Agelman before sending him back to Entwade.
Agelman hopes to return Léoflad to Edric's side and persuade the Thane not to abandon his charge in the wake of such a tragedy.

'Edric must be told what has happened here, and not a moment too soon.

'Poor Léoflad, I have known her since she was but a girl.... She was trained well in the art of sword-play, and I grieve that she did not remain at the Wade to aid us. And now... I fear for Edric, truly I do. Such a loss would break the strongest man. Were there only more time to mourn....

'I will prepare dear Léoflad for travel, and I shall bear her to the Wade with haste. Prepare a steed, [placeholder], and leave the rest to me.'
Readied the horse at Pendlac's Farm
'Well done, [placeholder]. Now then, allow me to ready Léoflad for her final journey.\n\n'Such a brave Woman....'
Ready the horse at Pendlac's Farm
The horses can be found near the farmhouse at Pendlac's Farm in south-eastern Kingstead.\n\nAgelman has asked that you ready a horse for him as he prepares Léoflad's body for travel back to Entwade.
